howTo.title: Select and move multiple objects
howTo.description: To select multiple objects, hold down Shift and drag the selection field across the objects or click them one by one. The selected objects can be moved, resized, locked, grouped, and aligned together.

howTo.title: How to navigate on the board
howTo.description: Toggle minimap by pressing M on your keyboard. To navigate around board, scroll your mouse wheel, use the scrolling gesture on a touchpad, or just use the minimap toolbar and adjust your zooming preferences.

howTo.title: How to import stickers from spreadsheet
howTo.description: Copy and paste cells from the spreadsheet using Ctrl+C / Ctrl+V (Cmd+C / Cmd+V) shortcuts to import them to the board.

howTo.title: How to add bulk stickers
howTo.description: If you need to add a bunch of stickers in a row, choose the Bulk add mode in a Sticker Tool and start typing away (and don't forget to hit Enter between separate ideas). Click Done, when you are finished.

howTo.title: How to draw arrow connectors
howTo.description: To create a link, select the line or arrow tool in the Shapes menu, click an object and drag your cursor to the other object without releasing the mouse button.

howTo.title: How to upload files
howTo.description: To upload files from your computer, click the + button in the toolbox, and choose Upload or Upload via URL, or other options.

howTo.title: How to share the board
howTo.description: To invite collaborators to the board, click on the Share button in the top-right corner, enter the email addresses, set the access rights and click Send. You can also share the board with people outside of Miro using a shareable link, or make any board available with a whole team in one click.

howTo.title: How to change access rights
howTo.description: To edit access rights of existing collaborators on the board, click on the Share button in the top-right corner, and choose Advanced. Specify access rights for individual users by clicking on the drop-down lists which state their current access rights.

howTo.title: How to share the screen
howTo.description: To share your screen, click the button in the bottom right corner and choose Screen sharing.

howTo.title: How to @mention someone
howTo.description: To mention a board participant in a comment or chat, type “@” followed by the person’s first and surname, or just pick the right person from the suggestions list that pops up when you start typing.

howTo.title: How to resolve a comment thread
howTo.description: To resolve the comments, open a comment thread and click Resolve button in the top-left corner of the thread. If you want your resolved comments to be visible on the board, just choose Show resolved option in the Comment feed.

howTo.title: How to collaborate in real time
howTo.description: Click on the Show collaborators' cursors button, and quickly jump to their point of view to see where they are on the board.

howTo.title: How to use frames
howTo.description: To create your first frame, select the Frames tool or press F on your keyboard, click Create first frame and then resize the blue selection zone to mark the boundaries of the first slide. To switch between the frames, click on their names.

howTo.title: How to make a presentation
howTo.description: To start creating a presentation, select the Frames tool. Each frame acts like a slide. To rename a frame, double-click on its current name. To reorder frames, click and drag them around. Your presentation can be exported as a PDF document, or previewed in fullscreen mode.

howTo.title: How to export stickers to spreadsheet
howTo.description: To export stickers to spreadsheet, put a frame around it, click on the context menu and choose Export to CSV.

howTo.title: How to print the board
howTo.description: Choose Save as image or Save as PDF in the Export board menu. Print out the exported document.

howTo.title: How change sticker's color
howTo.description: Click on sticker and choose the color or set up tags in object menu.

howTo.title: How to add emoji and tags on stickers
howTo.description: Click on sticker and add emoji or set up tags in object menu.

howTo.title: How to create an object
howTo.description: Use double click to add new text or create an object.

howTo.title: Convert a sticker into a Jira card with corresponding issue
howTo.description: Any sticker from a user story map, backlog or brainstorm session can become a task just in a few clicks. Open sticker and click Jira logo - that's it! Once you turn a sticker into a card the issue will be available in Jira.

howTo.title: Invite participants
howTo.description: Invite your team to the board to run a retrospective.

howTo.title: Add ideas to Start column
howTo.description:
Share your thoughts on how to start improving the workflow.
Tip: Use different sticker colors or tags for each user.

howTo.title: Add ideas to Stop column
howTo.description:
Suggest what your team should stop doing.
Tip: You can use bulk mode to speed up the ideation process.

howTo.title: Add ideas to Continue column
howTo.description:
Point out successful activities that the team should keep doing.
Tip: Vote with emoji to identify popular ideas.

howTo.title: Turn ideas into Actions
howTo.description:
Find out popular ideas that your team generate and create to do list.
Tip: Turn stickies into JIRA issues right on the board to speed up your work.

howTo.title: Invite participants
howTo.description: Invite your team to the board to plan tasks and track progress.

howTo.title: Easily customize your Kanban board
howTo.description: Create new and rename existing columns to customize Kanban board to your team workflow.

howTo.title: Manage your team work with swimlanes
howTo.description: Add, rename, move up or down and delete horizontal swimlanes, using the intuitive drop-down menu.

howTo.title: Use cards to add info about tasks
howTo.description: Create new cards or drag existing ones (incl. Jira cards) to the Kanban board. Expand cards to add details such as due dates and assignees.

howTo.title: Explore more tools
howTo.description: Use Kanban and other tools from the toolbar to visualize and share your ideas more effectively.

howTo.title: Discuss issues with your team
howTo.description:
Add comments and ask questions to discuss tasks.
Tip: Use @mentions to make your teammate put attention to the comment.

howTo.title: Bonus tip for Jira users
howTo.description: Using JIRA? Turn stickers into JIRA issues right on the board to speed up your work.

howTo.title: Invite your team
howTo.description: Invite your team to the board to create the User Story Map together.

howTo.title: Identify your user persona
howTo.description: Who is the target audience for your product and what is the problem your product solves for customers.

howTo.title: Describe step-by-step user tasks
howTo.description: That your persona needs to accomplish to get something done. Use a template "As a [persona] I want to [user task] so I can [final user goal]." Add as many tasks as you need with our flexible framework.

howTo.title: Group user tasks by goals or activities
howTo.description: To have a strategic view of your development process.

howTo.title: Add user stories below each user task
howTo.description: These will be your prioritized feature backlog for the product development.

howTo.title: Prioritize the stories for a sprint
howTo.description: Discuss workload with your team and define a minimum viable product for the first sprint.

howTo.title: Bonus tip: convert stories into tasks
howTo.description: Get ready for the sprint by converting Miro Cards into Jira tasks.

howTo.title: Invite your team
howTo.description: Invite your team to work on Mind Map together.

howTo.title: Use simple shortcuts
howTo.description: You can add a column by pressing Enter ↵. To split the theme to the next level, use Tab ⇥.

howTo.title: Organize your Mind Map
howTo.description: Make changes anytime. Drag and drop your nodes to wherever you want by using Drag + Cmd/Ctrl.

howTo.title: Auto align nodes
howTo.description: Focus on what’s really important during the ideation process. Align nodes with just one click in the toolbar.

howTo.title: Change color and style
howTo.description: Choose the color for parent nodes to differ topics, or make your map thin black and angular style.

howTo.title: Discover navigation
howTo.description: Zoom in/out help to make the most of unlimited space. Navigate on the board using your touchpad or mouse.

howTo.title: Explore more tools
howTo.description: Use Mind Map and other tools from the toolbar to visualize and share your ideas more effectively.

howTo.title: Bonus tip for Jira users
howTo.description: Using JIRA? Turn stickers into JIRA issues right on the board to speed up your work.
